word:
W. C. WHITE: HAVE YOU ANY LIGHT AS TO WHETHER OUR SUCCESS IN THE BATTLE WILL BE TO CUT DOWN EXPENSES AND HAVE A LIMITED FACULTY, OR WHETHER OUR SUCCESS 


                                     -44- 

WILL BE THROUGH BRANCHING OUT AND TRYING TO ENLARGE THE BUSINESS? IS THERE ANYTHING IN YOUR MIND WITH REFERENCE TO THE FUTURE HERE THAT WOULD GUIDE US AT ALL IN THIS MATTER?
